Articles.Content:
So I was trying to test a plane of mine, and when i tested it, it switched changed perspective to a plane that had crashed, and i couldn't switch to any other planes.  When i turn on the engine, it flips out for no reason. It didn't do that any other times. (For context i had closed the game a couple hours ago.  I also have mods installed, and workshop items.)

 

https://gfycat.com/aptsimplehumpbackwhale
Try recovering the cursed plane from the Tracking Station first?
